structure.unit: Chapter 33B AREAS OF CRITICAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN

law.catch_line: Exclusions to East Everglades Wetlands Disclosure Law.

text.section: The provisions of the East Everglades Wetlands Disclosure Law do not apply to all of Sections 14, 21, 22, 23, 27, 28; the south half of and the south half of the north half of; the east half of; the east half of; all land in which lies northerly and westerly of Levee L-31-N; the east half of the east half of; all within Township 55 South, Range 38 East, Miami-Dade County, Florida; or to any other parcels of real property in the East Everglades Area of Critical Environmental Concern when the sale or transfer of the subject property is to the South Florida Water Management District.
